summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Webhook Automations feature. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are working excellently. All 8 automation rules are active and processing events correctly. Creator registration triggers webhook events with proper action execution.
passed_tests: API GET /api/webhooks/events returns event log with proper structure (id, event_type, status, timestamp, actions_triggered)
API GET /api/webhooks/events?event_type=creator.registered filters events correctly
API GET /api/webhooks/events?status=completed filters by status correctly
API GET /api/webhooks/events without auth returns 401 (protected endpoint)
API GET /api/webhooks/rules returns all 8 automation rules with correct structure
All 8 expected event types present: creator.registered, creator.approved, proposal.submitted, proposal.approved, project.created, task.completed, revenue.recorded, arris.pattern_detected
API PATCH /api/webhooks/rules/{rule_id} toggles rule active status correctly
API GET /api/webhooks/stats returns correct statistics (total_events, events_last_24h, by_type, by_status, automation_rules)
API POST /api/webhooks/test triggers test webhook event successfully
API GET /api/webhooks/events/{event_id} returns specific event details
API GET /api/webhooks/events/{invalid_id} returns 404 for nonexistent event
Creator registration triggers creator.registered webhook event automatically
Webhook actions execute correctly: log_event, update_arris_memory, create_welcome_task
Webhooks Admin page loads at /webhooks route with proper layout
Stats cards display correctly: Total Events, Events (24h), Active Rules (8/8), Zero-Human Ops Active
Event Log tab displays events with ID, Type, Source, Status, Actions Triggered, Timestamp
Automation Rules tab displays all 8 rules with toggles and test buttons
Event type filter dropdown works correctly
Status filter dropdown works correctly
Refresh button updates data correctly
Toggle rule active/inactive works via UI
Test webhook button triggers test event and updates event count
Events by Type breakdown shows distribution correctly
Navigation to /webhooks from sidebar works correctly
seed_data_creation: Test webhook events created via API tests and UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Webhook Automations feature is fully functional. 8 automation rules are active by default. Events are triggered on: creator registration, creator approval/rejection, proposal creation/submission/approval/rejection, project creation, task completion, revenue recording. Webhook actions are MOCKED - they log events and update database records but don't send external HTTP requests. Test credentials: admin@hivehq.com / admin123
mocked_api_note: MOCKED: Webhook actions (log_event, update_arris_memory, create_welcome_task, etc.) update internal database records but do not send external HTTP requests
